TITLE.LOCALISED_TEXT: 魂(たましい)のフィールド

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Immer wenn eine Nichtspielsteinkreatur aus dem Spiel auf deinen Friedhof gelegt wird, bringe einen 1/1 weißen Geist-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.
Siempre que una criatura que no sea ficha vaya a tu cementerio desde el campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Espíritu blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.
トークンでないクリーチャーが１体戦場からあなたの墓地に置かれるたび、飛行を持つ白の１/１のスピリット・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
À chaque fois qu’une créature non-jeton est mise dans votre cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Esprit avec le vol.
Ogniqualvolta una creatura non pedina viene messa nel tuo cimitero dal campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Spirito 1/1 bianca con volare.
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: if (TriggerObject():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) ~= 0 and TriggerObject():GetOwner() == EffectController() and TriggerObject():IsToken() == 0) then return true else return false end
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 1 if token_count > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_SPIRIT_1_1_F_277469", token_count, EffectController() ) end
